# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that reflects whether or not the item is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this item is shown in a currently visible bar. This property is always [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] for spaces, proxy items, and groups.

This property is key-value observable.

## Managing item visibility

- **visibilityPriority**: Determines which items are shown in a bar when space is limited.
- **NSTouchBarItem.Priority**: Priorities for the visibility of a Touch Bar item.
